channel.title: Projects on metafunctor
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on metafunctor

item.title: digistar: Advanced Sandbox Networked Space Simulation
item.description: An advanced sandbox space simulation game leveraging GPU acceleration and optimized data structures like octrees to create a highly interactive and scalable sandbox for large n-body systems.

item.title: AlgoTree: Comprehensive Tree Structure Algorithms in Python
item.description: Explore the AlgoTree package, a suite of utilities for working with tree-like data structures in Python using a generic API (duck typing).

item.title: ollama_data_tools: Tools for working with Ollama model data.
item.description: Ollama Data Tools is a Python package and set of command line tools for working with Ollama model data, including searching, filtering, exporting,a and adapting for use with other inference engines like llamacpp.

item.title: Autoregressive Models: Inductive Biases and Projections
item.description: This paper explores inductive biases and projection functions to enhance out-of-distribution generalization in autoregressive models. With the theory in place, we aim to implement these ideas in Python and develop tests and evaluations to validate our approach.

item.title: SLUUG: Demystifying Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux: From Theory to Application
item.description: Presented for the St. Louis Unix Users Group (SLUUG) on Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux, titled ‘Demystifying Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux: From Theory to Application’.

item.title: Fine-Tuning Tiny LLMs for ElasticSearch DSL
item.description: I am creating a tiny LLM for ElasticSearch DSL as a proof of concept.

item.title: Bernoulli model
item.description: A general framework for constructing and working with Bernoulli models.

item.title: likelihood.model R package
item.description: An API for constructing and working with likelihood models; works well with algebraic.mle R package

item.title: likelihood.model.series.md R package
item.description: An R package for constructing likelihood models for series systems with masked component cause of failure and other censoring mechanisms.

item.title: Rate-distorted perfect hash filter
item.description: A model of a second-order Bernoulli set with false positives and false negatives

item.title: algebraic.mle R package
item.description: An API for algebraic maximum likelihood fitting

item.title: femtograd R package
item.description: An R package for backpropagation through a computational graph

item.title: Reliability Estimation in Series Systems
item.description: A simulation study is used to assess the sensitivity of the MLE to various parameters like sample size, masking probability, and other so on, using components with Weibull lifetimes arranged in series.

item.title: wei.series.md.c1.c2.c3
item.description: R package in narrow support of my master’s project in reliability estimation for series systems from masked failure data like the component cause of failure being unknown or the failure being censored.

item.title: algebraic.dist R package
item.description: An API for an algebra over distributions

item.title: R Package: Dynamic failure rate (DFR) distributions
item.description: An API for constructing and working with dynamic failure rates.

item.title: R package: md.tools
item.description: An API for constructing and working with likelihood models; works well with algebraic.mle R package

item.title: Homomorphic computational extensions
item.description: Class of homomorphic monads that extend algebraic data types in some well-defined way for faciliating faster or more accurate calculations, such as the logarithm trick.
